::KitKat:;

"I can't sleep.  When I close my eyes, I see her.  In my dreams I see 
her getting killed over and over again.  It's like she will forever 
haunt me."  She slams her fist into her pillow and tears rolled down 
her face plates."I did it to save her from the matrix only knows what 
kind of torture they would have put her through.  I just wish," she 
sobs," I just wish she knew that." She looked at Drillbit with tears 
running down her face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit let her cry on his shoulder. It hurt to see her like this.
> "Lay back and rest." He said, laying back, on the bed.
